text: Perebor () is a rural locality (a village) and the administrative center of Pereborskoye Rural Settlement, Beryozovsky District, Perm Krai, Russia. The population was 516 as of 2010. There are 11 streets. == Geography == It is located on the Shakva River. == References == Category:Rural localities in Beryozovsky District, Perm Krai
title: Perebor
